mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(title, importance, start_date , end_date, code, project) VALUES( #{title}, 0, STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate} ,'%Y %m %d' ) , STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate} ,'%Y %m %d' ), #{code}, 'easy')
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(a.oneday , '%Y%m%d') from ( select adddate(start_date, #{count}) oneday, code from boards where code = #{code}) A ,boards B where 1=1 and A.code = B.code and a.oneday >= start_date and a.oneday <= end_date
